An overhead lifeline system provides a secure, hands-free way for workers to move at height while maintaining a constant connection to a fall protection system. It typically consists of a rigid or flexible cable suspended overhead, along with connection points and fall arrest devices.

OVERHEAD LIFE LINE SYSTEM COMPONENTS

END ANCHOR
EYE CONNECTOR
SHOCK ABSORBER SPRING
TENSIONER
WIRE ROPE
TANDEM PULLEY
CARABINER HOOK
RETRACTABLE FALL ARRESTER
WIRE END CONNECTOR
FASTNERS

Heinrich's Overhead Lifeline Systems are engineered for maximum safety and flexibility, providing secure fall protection for workers in a wide range of industries and environments.

Special Features of Overhead Lifeline Systems

Continuous Mobility
Allows workers to move freely along the entire system without disconnecting.
Enhanced Safety
Engineered to arrest falls quickly and minimize risk of injury.
Easy Installation
Designed for quick and simple installation on a variety of structures.
Universal Application
Suitable for use in warehouses, loading bays, transport, and more.
All Weather Operation
Performs reliably in all weather conditions, including rain and snow.
Energy Absorbers
Integrated energy absorbers reduce impact forces in the event of a fall.
